headline: Evernorth Launches New Benefit Option That Drives Lower Net Cost for Weight Loss Medicines and Limits Patient Cost to No More Than $200 Per Month
summary: Evernorth, the health services division of The Cigna Group (NYSE: CI) announced a first-of-its-kind pharmacy benefit offering that make weight loss medications WEGOVY速 and ZEPBOUND速 more available to patients. Through direct negotiations with the medications' manufacturers, Evernorth has ensured that patients' monthly cost will not exceed $200.

headline: Cigna to offer $200 Wegovy, Zepbound weight-loss benefit
summary: Cigna will capout-of-pocket costs at $200 per month for patients using theweight-loss drugs Wegovy and Zepbound through an add-on to itspharmacy benefit management plans, the company announced...
